title: EASY ITALIAN EGGPLANT
directions: Slice eggplant into 1/3 to 1/2 inch thick slices (cut crosswise). Dip slices in butter and then bread crumbs. Sprinkle slices with oregano if desired. Spoon spaghetti sauce on top of each slice. Top eggplant with a slice of cheese. Place eggplant in a 400 degree oven for about 15-20 minutes or until cheese is slightly brown.
